metadata.name: Crypto Drunkenness
metadata.description:
Crypto Drunkenness 
Position: 48.83688, 2.35006    
Time: 1686800653 
â¨ Some real Drunkenness has been created and added into the blockchain  
â¨ The Drunkenness radiation was captured on a microchip at this place https://goo.gl/maps/EvR6PM9w1SXodpWaA

This emochain is drunkenness connected by radio frequency with this NFT. The artist Arseneca has created a link between the tangible and intangible world. The NFT contains the geographical coordinates from where drunkenness was created while drinking and the Unix time of the moment.  
 An emochain is like a vibrating rope between the two worlds. 
 The reflection in the NFT reveals the moment when the emochain was created
